metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food
o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer
o Scramble eggs in the same pan.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt. o Form mixture into flat cakes. o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth. o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil.
o Mix flour, butter, water, and beaten egg to form a dough, then let rest. o Sauté ground beef, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped olives, and raisins with cumin, paprika, and salt until cooked.
o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer o Add fish fillets, shrimp, and mussels, cook until seafood is done. o Serve hot with crusty bread.
o Form risotto into balls and stuff with a cube of mozzarella. o Dredge balls in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs. o Fry in hot oil until golden.
